thread.title: European factory growth knocked by "Beast from the East"

title: European factory growth knocked by "Beast from the East"
text:
European factory growth knocked by "Beast from the East" 9:44am EDT - 01:41 
Europe's manufacturing boom stumbled in March as optimism waned and demand ebbed owing to a powerful winter storm, surveys showed on Tuesday. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Europe's manufacturing boom stumbled in March as optimism waned and demand ebbed owing to a powerful winter storm, surveys showed on Tuesday. David Pollard reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2q1x4e8
